PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-09742019-06-27,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ECCC
ActGreenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
Environmental Violations Administrative Monetary Penalties Act
SubjectOutput-Based Pricing System Regulations
PrecisOUTPUT-BASED PRICING SYSTEM REGULATIONS in order to retain a price on carbon pollution that creates an incentive for emissions-intensive and trade-exposed facilities to reduce emissions per unit of output, while mitigating the risk of decreased domestic production and of carbon leakage to other jurisdictions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0266 Publication Date: 2019-07-10
AttachmentsAttachment
